title: Ep 258 | Phil's Busted Truck, Jase's Failed Driving Tests, and Making It Easy to Find Jesus
description:
Phil has a theory on why Jase had to take the tests three times to get his driver's license. Al becomes an emotional support animal for Lisa. Phil reminds everyone that he doesn't sell CBD oil. Jase discovers that Missy has been listening to "Unashamed," and he's nervous. Phil's truck won't crank, and he refuses to incriminate himself when Al presses him on car maintenance. And the guys talk about the things Americans try to add to the simple message of Jesus, debates in the church, and how we can make it easy for people to come to Jesus.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
